get.summary: ðŸš§ Get webhooks from a shop by id.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the webhook with supplied id. A comma separated list of ids can be supplied to retrieves multiple webhooks.

parameters.name: webhook_subscription_id
parameters.description: Id or comma separated list of id's of the webhook subscription(s).

delete.description: This endpoint deletes the webhook with supplied id. A comma separated list of ids can be supplied to delete multiple webhooks.

parameters.name: webhook_subscription_id
parameters.description: Id or comma separated list of id's of the webhook subscription(s).
